title: Spinach Salad with Poppy Seed Dressing
directions: Make the poppy seed dressing by whisking together the creamy salad dressing, vinegar, sugar, and poppy seeds; set aside. Arrange the spinach leaves, mixed salad greens, oranges, onion, and almonds onto individual salad plates. Drizzle with poppy seed dressing to serve.
ingredients: 1/2 cup creamy salad dressing (e.g. Miracle Whip)
